query:
I want a beautifuly header:
                             in the right a image box have logo and title of website.
                             in the left many item link that each of them have a icon and text.
                             like : link to shoppage, link to about us page, link to contact us page.
                             and at the end of left side a button for login.

tasks.title: Create a container tag for the header with appropriate styles.

result_task.title: Header Container
result_task.description: This component creates a header container with appropriate styles.
result_task.jsx_code:
<KdSegment expandable={true} defaultOpen={true} label={props.title || state.headerTitle}>
  <KdTypography variant="h1" type="string" title={props.title || state.headerTitle} />
</KdSegment>

tasks.title: Create a tag for the image box on the right with logo and title.

result_task.title: Image Box with Logo and Title
result_task.description: This component creates an image box on the right with a logo and title.
result_task.jsx_code:
<KdpaGrid container>
  <KdpaGrid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
    <KdImageBox src="imageSrc" alt="imageAlt" modal={true} quality="HIGH" loading="lazy" />
  </KdpaGrid>
  <KdpaGrid item xs={12} sm={6} md={8}>
    <KdImageBox src="logoSrc" alt="logoAlt" modal={false} quality="LOW" loading="lazy" />
    <KdTypography variant="h6" title="title" />
  </KdpaGrid>
</KdpaGrid>

tasks.title: Create a tag for the navigation links on the left.

result_task.title: Navigation Links Tag
result_task.description: A tag component for navigation links on the left.
result_task.jsx_code:
<KdpaGrid container>
  <KdpaGrid item xs={12}>
    <Link title="Home" href="/home" target="default">
      Home
    </Link>
  </KdpaGrid>
  <KdpaGrid item xs={12}>
    <Link title="About" href="/about" target="default">
      About
    </Link>
  </KdpaGrid>
  <KdpaGrid item xs={12}>
    <Link title="Contact" href="/contact" target="default">
      Contact
    </Link>
  </KdpaGrid>
</KdpaGrid>

tasks.title: Create individual tags for each navigation link with an icon and text (Shop Page, About Us, Contact Us).

result_task.title: Navigation Links with Icons and Text
result_task.description: Creates navigation links for Shop Page, About Us, and Contact Us with associated icons and text.

states.name: navigationLinks
states.defaultValue: [{icon: '<MdShoppingCart />', text: 'Shop Page'}, {icon: '<MdInfoOutline />', text: 'About Us'}, {icon: '<MdContactMail />', text: 'Contact Us'}]

result_task.jsx_code:
<KdpaGrid container>
  {navigationLinks.map((link, index) => (
    <KdpaGrid item xs={12} sm={4} key={index}>
      <KdTooltip title={link.text}>
        <KdpaIconButton title={link.text} icon={link.icon} />
      </KdTooltip>
      <KdTypography title={link.text} variant="body1" />
    </KdpaGrid>
  ))}
</KdpaGrid>

tasks.title: Create a tag for the button on the left side for login.

result_task.title: Login Button Component
result_task.description: This component creates a button on the left side for login using the KdpaPrimaryButton.

tasks.title: Ensure proper alignment and styling for the header layout.

result_task.title: Header Layout Alignment and Styling
result_task.description: This component ensures the proper alignment and styling of the header using defined UI elements.
result_task.jsx_code:
<KdpaGrid container>
  <KdpaGrid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
    <KdAlert severity={alertSeverity} title={alertTitle} />
  </KdpaGrid>
  <KdpaGrid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
    <KdTypography variant="h1" title="Header Layout" />
  </KdpaGrid>
  <KdpaGrid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
    <KdpaPrimaryButton title={buttonTitle} variant="contained" loading={buttonLoading} />
  </KdpaGrid>
</KdpaGrid>

final_result.title: Create container for header
final_result.description: A container for the header with appropriate styles and layout.
